staff_of_homa.name: Staff of Homa
staff_of_homa.passive: HP increased by 20-40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8-1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1-1.8% of Max HP.

skyward_harp.name: Skyward Harp
skyward_harp.passive: Increases CRIT DMG by 20-40%. Hits have a 60-100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4-2s.

primordial_jade_cutter.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
primordial_jade_cutter.passive: HP increased by 20-40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2-2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

summit_shaper.name: Summit Shaper
summit_shaper.passive: Increases Shield Strength by 20-40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4-8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

vortex_vanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
vortex_vanquisher.passive: Increases Shield Strength by 20-40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4-8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

the_unforged.name: The Unforged
the_unforged.passive: Increases Shield Strength by 20-40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4-8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

memory_of_dust.name: Memory of Dust
memory_of_dust.passive: Increases Shield Strength by 20-40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4-8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

skyward_spine.name: Skyward Spine
skyward_spine.passive: Increases CRIT Rate by 8-16% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vaccuum blade that deals 40-100% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

aquila_favonia.name: Aquila Favonia
aquila_favonia.passive: ATK is increased by 20-40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100-160% of ATK and dealing 200-320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

skyward_blade.name: Skyward Blade
skyward_blade.passive: Crit Rate increased by 4-8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20-40% for 12s.

wolf_gravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolf_gravestone.passive: Increases ATK by 20-40%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40-80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

skyward_pride.name: Skyward Pride
skyward_pride.passive: Increases all DMG by 8-16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80-160% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

skyward_atlas.name: Skyward Atlas
skyward_atlas.passive: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12-24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160-320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lost_prayer_to_the_sacred_winds.passive: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8-16% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

primordial_jade_winged_spear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
primordial_jade_winged_spear.passive: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2-6.0% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12-24%.

amos_bow.name: Amos' Bow
amos_bow.passive: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 12-24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8-16% every 0.1 seconds up to 5 times.

sacrificial_bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificial_bow.passive: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40-80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30-16s.

the_black_sword.name: The Black Sword
the_black_sword.passive:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20-40%.
Additionally, regenerates 60-100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

wine_and_song.name: Wine and Song
wine_and_song.passive: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8-16% ATK increase and 3-5% Movement SPD increase.

blackcliff_warbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
blackcliff_warbow.passive: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12-24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliff_slasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
blackcliff_slasher.passive: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12-24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
deathmatch.passive: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16-32% and DEF is increased by 16-32%. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24-48%.

the_viridescent_hunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
the_viridescent_hunt.passive: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40-80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14-10s.

serpent_spine.name: Serpent Spine
serpent_spine.passive: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6-10% more DMG and take 3-1.8%  more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

eye_of_perception.name: Eye of Perception
eye_of_perception.passive: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240-360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12-8s.

lithic_blade.name: Lithic Blade
lithic_blade.passive: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7-11% ATK increase and 3-7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

the_flute.name: The Flute
the_flute.passive: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100-200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

sacrificial_sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificial_sword.passive: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40-80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30-16s.

royal_longsword.name: Royal Longsword
royal_longsword.passive: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8-16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

prototype_rancour.name: Prototype Rancour
prototype_rancour.passive: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4-8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

lion_roar.name: Lion's Roar
lion_roar.passive: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20-36%.

prototype_crescent.name: Prototype Crescent
prototype_crescent.passive: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36-72% for 10s.

lithic_spear.name: Lithic Spear
lithic_spear.passive: For every characters who hails from Liyue, the characters who equips this weapon gains 7-11% ATK increase and a 3-7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

alley_hunter.name: Alley Hunter
alley_hunter.passive: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 4-8% and their CRIT DMG increases by 4-8%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

prototype_starglitter.name: Prototype Starglitter
prototype_starglitter.passive: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8-16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

favonius_warbow.name: Favonius Warbow
favonius_warbow.passive: CRIT hits have a 60-100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12-6s.

dragonspine_spear.name: Dragonspine Spear
sources: Reward from The Festering Fang World Quest
dragonspine_spear.passive: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60-100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80-140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200-360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

snow_tombed_starsilver.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
sources: Reward for the Ancient Carvings puzzle
snow_tombed_starsilver.passive: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60-100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80-140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200-360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

festering_desire.name: Festering Desire
sources: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon Event
festering_desire.passive: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16-32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6-12%.

compound_bow.name: Compound Bow
compound_bow.passive: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4-8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2-2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

frostbearer.name: Frostbearer
frostbearer.passive: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60-100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80-140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200-360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

royal_spear.name: Royal Spear
royal_spear.passive: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8-16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

royal_bow.name: Royal Bow
royal_bow.passive: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8-16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

favonius_sword.name: Favonius Sword
favonius_sword.passive: CRIT hits have a 60-100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12-6s.

rust.name: Rust
rust.passive: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40-80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

the_stringless.name: The Stringless
the_stringless.passive: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24-48%.

sacrificial_greatsword.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
sacrificial_greatsword.passive: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40-80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30-16s.

sword_of_descension.name: Sword of Descension
sword_of_descension.passive: Hitting enemies with Normal or Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

favonius_lance.name: Favonius Lance
favonius_lance.passive: CRIT hits have a 60-100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12-6s.

blackcliff_longsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
blackcliff_longsword.passive: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12-24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

iron_sting.name: Iron Sting
iron_sting.passive: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6-12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

dragon_bane.name: Dragon's Bane
dragon_bane.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20-36%.

the_bell.name: The Bell
the_bell.passive: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20-32% of max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12-24% increased DMG.

blackcliff_agate.name: Blackcliff Agate
blackcliff_agate.passive: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12-24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

favonius_codex.name: Favonius Codex
favonius_codex.passive: CRIT hits have a 60-100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12-6s.

mappa_mare.name: Mappa Mare
mappa_mare.passive: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8-16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

prototype_amber.name: Prototype Amber
prototype_amber.passive: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4-6 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4-6% HP every 2s for this duration.

royal_grimoire.name: Royal Grimoire
royal_grimoire.passive: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8-16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

sacrificial_fragments.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificial_fragments.passive: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40-80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30-16s.

solar_pearl.name: Solar Pearl
solar_pearl.passive: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20-40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20-40% for 6s.

the_widsith.name: The Widsith
the_widsith.passive:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
Recitative: ATK is increased by 60-120%.
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48-96%.
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240-480.

blackcliff_pole.name: Blackcliff Pole
blackcliff_pole.passive: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12-24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

prototype_archaic.name: Prototype Archaic
prototype_archaic.passive: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240-480% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

rainslasher.name: Rainslasher
rainslasher.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20-36%.

royal_greatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
royal_greatsword.passive: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8-16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

favonius_greatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
favonius_greatsword.passive: CRIT hits have a 60-100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12-6s.

crescent_pike.name: Crescent Pike
crescent_pike.passive: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20-40% ATK as DMG for 5s.

whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.passive: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6-12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (24-48%  total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.

bloodtainted_greatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bloodtainted_greatsword.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12-24%.

cool_steel.name: Cool Steel
cool_steel.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12-24%.

dark_iron_sword.name: Dark Iron Sword
dark_iron_sword.passive: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20-40% for 12s.

harbinger_of_dawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
harbinger_of_dawn.passive: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14-28%.

emerald_orb.name: Emerald Orb
emerald_orb.passive: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20-40% for 12s.

magic_guide.name: Magic Guide
magic_guide.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12-24%.

thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrilling_tales_of_dragon_slayers.passive: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24-48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.passive: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160-320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

otherworldly_story.name: Otherworldly Story
otherworldly_story.passive: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1-2% HP.

debate_club.name: Debate Club
debate_club.passive: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60-120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

traveler_handy_sword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
traveler_handy_sword.passive: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1-2% HP.

skyrider_sword.name: Skyrider Sword
skyrider_sword.passive: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12-24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.passive: Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional 100-200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

raven_bow.name: Raven Bow
raven_bow.passive: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12-24%.

twin_nephrite.name: Twin Nephrite
twin_nephrite.passive: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12-20% for 15s.

ferrous_shadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
ferrous_shadow.passive: When HP falls below 70-90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30-50%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

fillet_blade.name: Fillet Blade
fillet_blade.passive: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240-400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15-11s.

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.passive: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36-60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

sharpshooter_oath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshooter_oath.passive: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24-48%.

skyrider_greatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
sources: Stuck inside a stone in Guyun Stone Forest
skyrider_greatsword.passive: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6-10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

set: Heal 30% MHP over 5 seconds (6% MHP/s) after opening a chest
Heal 300 HP after picking up Mora
Heal 20% MHP after using elemental burst
+120 EM to all party members after triggering an elemental reaction
+24% crit rate (additional) when HP is below 70%
+2 energy every 2 seconds for 6 seconds to all other party members after using elemental burst (cannot stack)
+30% damage against opponents with more than 50% HP
+15% damage on normal and charged attacks
+25% damage on normal and charged attacks (additional) after using elemental skill
Remove elemental skill CD after defeating an opponent (15 second cooldown)
+30% RES to each unique element present in your party
+3 energy to all party members with a bow or catalyst equipped after gaining an elemental particle (3 second cooldown)
+30% RES to the corresponding element for 10 seconds when taking elemental damage (10 second cooldown)
+35% normal attack damage (sword, claymore, and polearm users only)
+35% charged attack damage (catalyst and bow users only)
+20% ATK for all party members for 12 seconds after using elemental burst (cannot stack)
+20% incoming healing for all party members for 10 seconds after using elemental skill or burst
+40% normal and charged attack damage while shielded
+40% overloaded and burning damage, +15% vaporize and melt damage, +7.5% pyro damage bonus for 10 seconds after using an elemental skill (3 stacks)
+35% damage against opponents affected by pyro
+30% normal and charged attack damage for 15 seconds after using an elemental skill
+40% overloaded, electro-charged, and superconduct damage, triggering one of these reactions decreases elemental skill cooldown by 1 second (0.8 second cooldown)
+35% damage against opponents affected by electro
+60% swirl damage, -40% RES to the infused element for 10 seconds to opponents upon triggering swirl
+20% crit rate for all party members against opponents affected by cryo, +20% (additional) against frozen enemies
+35% damage bonus to all party members for the corresponding element for 10 seconds after obtaining a shard created through a crystallize reaction (only one such effect may be gained at once)
+50% charged attack damage and -100% charged attack stamina cost for 10 seconds after defeating an opponent (including wild animals)
